assessment.name: Reflective Journal
assessment.weight: Three journals must be submitted to pass

assessment.name: Placement Timesheet
assessment.weight: 90 hours must be completed and signed off to pass the course

assessment.name: Seminar Participation
assessment.weight: Attendance is compulsory to pass the course

assessment.name: My Work Placement (Poster)
assessment.weight: A PASS grade must be achieved
